mapper.insert: insert into source_code (s_id, l_c_id, a_id, m_id, code, s_like) select (select * from (select ifnull(max(s_id)+1, 1) from source_code) s_id), T3.l_c_id, T1.a_id, T4.m_id, #{solutionData.code} code, 0 s_like from algorithm T1 left join source_code T2 on T1.a_id = T2.a_id, (select l_c_id from language_category where language = #{solutionData.language}) T3, (select m_id from member where m_name = #{solutionData.m_name}) T4 where T1.a_id = #{solutionData.a_id} group by T1.a_id;
